description: Inauguration of President Biden following contested election and Jan 6 insurrection
Georgia passes SB 202, restrictive voting law limiting ballot drop boxes and early voting
Arizona Senate begins partisan audit of 2020 election results
Texas enacts SB 1, voting restrictions including limits on mail voting
Elon Musk announces acquisition of Twitter, raising concerns about content moderation
Midterm elections see increased election denial rhetoric and threats to election workers
Former President Trump indicted on charges related to election interference
Georgia grand jury indicts Trump and allies on election interference charges
Third anniversary of Jan 6 insurrection with continued election denial rhetoric
